        gABC
      • gABC(ctx: var TCtx; n: CgNode; opc: TOpcode; a, b, c: TRegister = 0)
  Source   Edit

This module implements the code generator for the VM.

Imports

../ast/renderer, ../ast/types, ../ast/ast, ../ast/lineinfos, ../ast/astmsgs, ../backend/cgir, ../modules/magicsys, ../modules/modulegraphs, ../front/msgs, ../front/options, ../utils/containers, ../utils/idioms, vmaux, vmdef, vmlinker, vmobjects, vmtypegen, vmtypes, ../backend/compat

Types

CodeGenCtx = object
  prc: BProc
  graph*: ModuleGraph
  config*: ConfigRef
  mode*: TEvalMode
  features*: TSandboxFlags
  module*: PSym
  linking*: LinkerData
  code*: seq[TInstr]
  debug*: seq[TLineInfo]
  constants*: seq[VmConstant]
  typeInfoCache*: TypeInfoCache
  rtti*: seq[VmTypeInfo]
Bundles all input, output, and other contextual data needed for the code generator   Source   Edit 
VmGenResult = Result[CodeInfo, VmGenDiag]
Result of a vmgen invocation   Source   Edit

Consts

MagicsToKeep = {mNone, mIsolate, mNHint, mNWarning, mNError, mMinI, mMaxI,
                mAbsI, mDotDot}
the set of magics that are kept as normal procedure calls and thus need an entry in the function table. For convenience, the mNone magic is also included   Source   Edit

func gABC(ctx: var TCtx; i: TLineInfo; opc: TOpcode; a, b, c: TRegister = 0) {.
    ...raises: [], tags: [].}
Takes the registers b and c, applies the operation opc to them, and stores the result into register a The node is needed for debug information   Source   Edit
